title: SimCity 4 (original without expansions)
description:
Original Simcity4 without Rush Hour expansion, no crack is needed

English and Russian language, Installer is in Russian but works ok

1. Unzip .zip file into directory using 7zip
2. Right click on Setup.exe - Properties - Check Run as "administrator" and select Windows XP compatibility - Save
3. Run Setup.exe - In language selection choose English, during install there will be error, just click ok, install will continue
4. Enjoy the game! Crack is not needed.

If you have crashes or game does not run in windows 7/8/10 - follow this guide: http://us.informatiweb.net/tutorials/games/4-simcity-4/11--simcity-4-deluxe-edition-installation-under-windows-8.html
or this one
